item.title: componentversions
item.description: Usage # ocm sign componentversions [<options>] {<component-reference>} Description # Sign specified component versions. If the –repo option is specified, the given names are interpreted relative to the specified repository using the syntax <component>[:<version>] If no –repo option is specified the given names are interpreted as located OCM component version references: [<repo type>::]<host>[:<port>][/<base path>]//<component>[:<version>] Additionally there is a variant to denote common transport archives and general repository specifications [<repo type>::]<filepath>|<spec json>[//<component>[:<version>]] The –repo option takes an OCM repository specification:
